Detailed Description

class.dateTimeManager.php

This class manages the many different transformations that can be done on datetimes. These include shifting datetimes, rolling over into consecutive months, years, and the like. It uses the format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

Name: class.dateTimeManager.php Author: Albert L. Lash, IV Email: alash@plateauinnovation.com Version: 0.1 Date: 08/29/02 1:00PM EST License: GPL

dateTimeManager.shift_dates ( $  datetime,
$  shift_amount,
$  shift_unit 
)

Shifts from and to dates by $shift_amount of $shift_units shift_units: months = mo; days = d; years = y; hours = h; minutes = mi; seconds = s;
